sourcesContent:
// Importing combination import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Text, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Image , Stack, Heading, Divider, ButtonGroup, Button } from '@chakra-ui/react' export function LandingPage(props: any) { const [closet, setCloset] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { async function getCloset() { const response = await fetch( `http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/closet` ) setCloset(await response.json()) } getCloset() }, [closet]) return (
{closet.map((c: any) => ( Living room Sofa This sofa is perfect for modern tropical spaces, baroque inspired spaces, earthy toned spaces and for people who love a chic design with a sprinkle of vintage design. $450 ))}
); }
